title: Untouchable
description: After everything he’s been through—realizing he is an alien, being thrown into the middle of an intergalactic war, and finding true love—you’d think Troy Connor would at least be happy with his new life. But as it turns out, nothing is going well for him. As new obstacles begin to arise, Troy must decide whether to hold on to his responsibilities as the heroic Lion-Man, or to throw it all away for a normal life.
author: Dewayne Haslett
